alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 02 at 10:43AM CDT until April 04 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Eureka. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River near Arnold. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Arnold. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Corisande Hills Road begins flooding at this height. Meramec Bottom Road between Hageman Road and Highway 21 begins flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 23.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 24.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Arnold 24.0 23.6 Sat 10 am 23.8 19.8 16.3 15.0 14.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
